revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=FON Wireless |model=La Fonera+ FON2201 |revision=B |upc=893984001107 |asin= |fcc_date=06/04/2007 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=UVA-FON2201 |pcb_id=2976282902 |pwr_v=7.5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2315A |cpu1_cspeed=180 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=25L6405MC-20G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L128168A-7T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J502 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, populated,, JP1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2315A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060;88E6060-RCJ1, B69780.1, 0726 B0E, TW; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=RedBoot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.19.2;OpenWrt; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, Gargoyle, |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=MyPlace, FON_AP |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:18:84 |oui_eth=00:18:84 }} '''La Fonera + WiFi Router''' :[http://download.fon.com/firmware/foneraplus/latest/foneraplus.tar.bz2 GPL Source]
"2976282902" is silkscreened on the board (OEM: [[Delta Networks]]). :SSID MyPlace is private and FON_AP is public.
Because of the locked down nature of the stock boot loader the simplest way :to load alternative firmware is to use the [http://www.gargoyle-router.com/wiki/doku.php?id=fon_flash FonFlash] software available :at the [http://www.gargoyle-router.com/download.php Gargolye] download page.
This software can be used to load OpenWRT and DD-WRT in addition to Gargoyle.
==Images== <gallery caption="[[User:RayKnight|RayKnight]]'s unit"> File:FON2201B 1.JPG|front File:FON2201B 3.JPG|PCB top File:FON2201B 2.JPG|PCB bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
